title: How has econ. ideology of CCP changed since Deng

content.question: Describe how the economic ideology of the Chinese Communist Party (CCP) has changed since the time Deng Xiaoping held power. Explain two reasons why the CCP has changed its economic ideology over the past 30 years.

frqParts.text: Describe how the economic ideology of the Chinese Communist Party (CCP) has changed since the time Deng Xiaoping held power. Explain two reasons why the CCP has changed its economic ideology over the past 30 years.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

topic.text: 5.2: Political Responses to Global Market Forces

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
